"A.D.2028/3/30/12:00": "5 years ago... I lost both of my parents from an accident. When I was on the edge of despair, a kind, gentle voice reached me... That's, my meeting with \"Mother\"."
"It wasn't a direct meeting but, \"Mother's\" voice over the Ether, it was gentle, very warm, and above all, it was always right."
"That's why I joined \"Mother Cluster\". Believing in \"Mother's\" words, acting for her. It's an organization for \"Mother\" ."
"...Okay Aru, you can open your eyes now."
"Uwaah..! This is amazing... We came to another world..!"
"...Just by connecting our hands, he also came here. Adding to that, our clothes stayed the same as the ones we were wearing on Earth."
"Aru also came here as he is... That means, he's the same as me?- But, \"Mother\" didn't say anything like that."
"...Sierra."
"Yes yes, the ready-to-be-called Sierra is here-... Wai-Hitsugi, the atmosphere tells me it's something serious..."
"<%me>'s there too right? I want you to take a look at Aru. Is it okay for me to go there?"
"...Yes, we'll be waiting."
"Big sis, where are we going?"
"..I'm going to find out the truth, about what's right."
"It's alright Aru. Don't worry. If anything happends, I'm always on your side."
"Okay. Even so, I could say the same thing. I'll always be on your side, Big sis."
"...Thank you."
"We've been waiting, Hitsugi. Also, Aru."
"1. It looks like you've calm down."
"2. Are you forcing youself?"
"If it looks that way then, it seems like I've braced myself up abit."
"Honestly, my head's still clouded and foggy. It's possible that the things I believed in will turn upside-down- because I don't know anything."
"...I would be lying if I said \"I'm not pushing myself that much\"."
"Although, I've braced myself. There's still confusion but... If I'm prepared, then I can handle anything."
"I hate it when I don't know anything. I hate losing something important because I can't do anything about it. "
"I want to know. About the truth."
"...I understand. Alright Aru, can you lend me your hand. Let's shake hands together."
"Confirming direct contact. Begin direct scanning... Wha-!?"
"Hitsugi!"
"1. Where's Hitsugi and Aru?"
"2. Sierra, are you alright?"
"...I don't know. They just disappeared, I think."
"..Y-yup. I'm fine- I was just surprised. More importantly, Hitsugi and Aru..!"
"In that instant, during the direct contact, it feels like something's pulling back, forcing the link to disconnect... Fearing our contact with Aru."
